message: Let's split the money 60/40. This ensures you get a good deal and we avoid the risk of inflation eating away at our gains in later rounds.
I propose a 55/45 split in my favor. This reflects the fact that the money depreciates faster for you, and it gives us a chance to secure a deal before inflation bites too hard.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. This is a counter-proposal, acknowledging the inflation but still offering a fair split.
